author: @gurufocus
title: Selective Insurance Group Inc Reports Q1 2025 EPS of $1.76, Revenue of $1,285. ...
text:
On April 23, 2025, Selective Insurance Group Inc (SIGI, Financial) released its 8-K filing detailing the financial results for the first quarter of 2025. The company reported a net income per diluted common share of $1.76, which fell short of the analyst estimate of $1.96. Total revenues for the quarter reached $1,285.2 million, surpassing the estimated $1,256.52 million. Selective Insurance Group Inc, a regional property-casualty insurer based in New Jersey, operates primarily in the New York metropolitan area with four segments: Standard Commercial Lines, Standard Personal Lines, E&S Lines, and Investments.
Company Performance and Challenges
Selective Insurance Group Inc (SIGI, Financial) reported a 7% increase in net premiums written (NPW) from the first quarter of 2024, driven by a 10.3% increase in renewal pure price. The GAAP combined ratio improved to 96.1% from 98.2% in the previous year, indicating better underwriting performance. However, the company's earnings per share (EPS) of $1.76 did not meet the analyst estimate of $1.96. This could raise concerns among investors about the company's ability to meet market expectations.
Financial Achievements and Industry Importance
The company's return on common equity (ROE) and non-GAAP operating ROE stood at 14.4%, reflecting strong profitability. Net investment income increased by 12% to $96 million after-tax, contributing significantly to the company's financial performance. These achievements are crucial for an insurance company like Selective Insurance Group Inc (SIGI, Financial), as they highlight the company's ability to generate returns on its investments and maintain a healthy balance sheet.
Key Financial Metrics
Selective Insurance Group Inc (SIGI, Financial) reported a book value per common share of $50.33, a 5% increase from the previous quarter. The adjusted book value per common share rose to $53.39, up 2% from last quarter. The company's total assets increased by 5% to $14,197.6 million, while stockholders' equity grew by 4% to $3,258.5 million. These metrics are important as they provide insights into the company's financial health and its ability to sustain growth.
Metric | Q1 2025 | Q1 2024 | Change |
---|---|---|---|
Net Premiums Written | $1,240.4 million | $1,156.6 million | 7% |
Net Investment Income | $120.7 million | $107.8 million | 12% |
Net Income per Diluted Share | $1.76 | $1.31 | 34% |
Book Value per Common Share | $50.33 | $46.17 | 9% |
Segment Performance
The Standard Commercial Lines segment, which represents 81% of total NPW, grew by 8% with a combined ratio of 96.4%. The Standard Personal Lines segment saw a 12% decrease in premiums due to profit improvement actions, while the Excess and Surplus Lines segment experienced a 20% increase in premiums, driven by strong policy count growth.
“Our operating ROE of 14.4% for the first quarter was a positive start to the year and our full-year combined ratio guidance remains at 96% to 97%,” said John J. Marchioni, Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer.
Analysis and Conclusion
Selective Insurance Group Inc (SIGI, Financial) demonstrated solid revenue growth and improved underwriting performance in the first quarter of 2025. However, the shortfall in EPS compared to analyst estimates may be a point of concern for investors. The company's strategic focus on rate increases and underwriting discipline appears to be yielding positive results, as evidenced by the improved combined ratio and strong ROE. Moving forward, maintaining this momentum will be crucial for sustaining investor confidence and achieving long-term growth.
Explore the complete 8-K earnings release (here) from Selective Insurance Group Inc for further details.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Belga Belga
title: Climat - France: la vigilance orange canicule ou crue persiste dans 12 départements
text:
Climat - France: la vigilance orange canicule ou crue persiste dans 12 départements
La vigilance orange pour canicule déclenchée dimanche dans le sud-est de la France concernera toujours neuf départements vendredi, selon Météo France. Les Bouches-du-Rhône, qui accueillent les épreuves olympiques de voile à Marseille, ne seront pas épargnées. Trois départements d'Ile-de-France et de l'est restent par ailleurs placés en vigilance orange pour les risques de crues (Seine-et-Marne, Meurthe-et-Moselle et Vosges).
- Publié le 02-08-2024 à 08h14
- à Ajaccio, France

author: Adewale Olarinde
title: Bitcoin traders step back: Options OI sees historic drop as market sentiment sours - 'AMBCrypto' News Summary (United States) | BEAMSTART
text:
Quick Summary: Bitcoin Options OI hits record lows, reflecting a shift to cautious trading amid market uncertainties.
This trend is further amplified by declining volumes and subdued price action, which collectively indicate a lack of strong catalysts for significant market moves.
The current drop underscores a retreat by market participants from leveraged positions, likely influenced by global economic pressures and fears of sustained rate hikes by the Federal Reserve.

author: Kit Heren
title: Ambulance passenger in his 90s killed in horror crash that also left driver of other car... - LBC
text: [ Nick Abbot ](/radio/presenters/nick-abbot/) 10pm - 1am Ambulance passenger in his 90s killed in horror crash that also left driver of other car dead 28 December 2023, 21:59 A man being transported in an ambulance has been killed in a crash with a car whose driver, a woman in her 70s, also died. Listen to this article Loading audio... Emergency services were called to the B1506 Bury Road, between Newmarket and Kentford, at about 7.30pm on December 19. One of those killed was a woman in her 70s, who was driving the car, a blue Volkswagen Golf. [Read more: 'Good Samaritan' father-of-two killed in car ram attack in front of children after stopping to help stranger](/news/sheffield-father-of-two-killed-car-ram-helping-stranger/) [Read more: Three men die after 4x4 plunges into North Yorkshire river amid strong winds and rain brought by Storm Gerrit](/news/three-men-die-after-4x4-plunges-into-north-yorkshire-river-gerrit/) The other was a man in his 90s, a passenger in the ambulance, who died after being taken to Addenbrooke's Hospital, Suffolk Police said. The female ambulance driver suffered serious injuries and was also taken to hospital. The second passenger, a woman, sustained minor injuries. Firefighters and ambulances were in attendance, as well as police, as they conducted their investigations. The road was closed temporarily on the evening of December 19, and drivers were advised to find alternative routes. Police are appealing for witnesses, who can call 101, quoting SC-19122023-302.

author: Sergio Segura
title: Bona nit de Reis! Fotos i imatges per felicitar una de les nits més màgiques de l’any
text: Bona nit de Reis! Ja ha arribat una de les nits i matinades més màgiques de l’any, aquella en què els Reis d’Orient, també coneguts com a Reis Mags, arriben a les llars de la ciutadania a deixar regals. Si vols desitjar una bona nit de Reis als teus contactes, en aquesta pàgina t’oferim diverses fotos i imatges que pots descarregar-te per compartir amb els teus contactes i fer felicitacions originals. Bon dia de Reis 2024! Fotos, imatges, GIF i felicitacions per a uns bons Reis el 6 de gener Desitja una bona nit de Reis amb fotos, GIF, “stickers” i altres felicitacions originals per compartir amb amics, familiars i companys de feina o a les xarxes socials! Bona nit de Reis! Imatges i fotos Una bona font per trobar fotos per desitjar una bona nit de Reis és Pinterest, en què es poden trobar imatges com les següents: Feliç dia de Reis! 10 frases per compartir per WhatsApp amb els teus contactes aquest 2024 Guia completa i en actualització constant sobre la cavalcada de Reis 2024 a Barcelona Frases per a una bona nit de Reis Si, en canvi, vols optar per una frase senzilla, aquí tens algunes propostes: - “Que la màgia d’aquesta nit porti somnis plens d’il·lusió i alegria. Bona nit de Reis!”. - “Que els Reis d’Orient portin somnis de felicitat i sorpreses meravelloses. Bona nit i bon dia de Reis!“. - “Que la nit sigui plena de màgia i els teus somnis estiguin plens de regals i alegria. Bona nit!”. - “Que els Reis Mags et portin tot el que desitges i més en aquesta nit màgica. Bona nit de Reis!”. - “Que la nit estigui plena de somriures, il·lusió i molta màgia. Bona nit i feliç dia de Reis!”. - “Que mentre dormis, els Reis Mags portin tot el que el teu cor desitja. Bona nit i que tinguis un meravellós dia de Reis!”.

author: Dave Nichols
title: Spokane Indians put six on Northwest League all-stars; Karros named MVP, Sullivan pitcher of the year - Thu, 19 Sep 2024 PST
text: Spokane Indians put six on Northwest League all-stars; Karros named MVP, Sullivan pitcher of the year The Northwest League-champion Spokane Indians placed six players on the league’s postseason all-star team, announced by Minor League Baseball on Thursday. Third baseman Kyle Karros was named NWL Most Valuable Player and Sean Sullivan was named pitcher of the year. In addition, outfielder Cole Carrigg, starting pitcher Chase Dollander, and relievers Zach Agnos and Carson Skipper were also recognized. Karros, 22, led the league in most offensive categories, including batting average (.311), on-base percentage (.390), slugging percentage (.485), doubles (33) and RBIs (78). His 15 home runs were second to Carrigg. To go with his league-leading homers, Carrigg hit .280/.358/.475 with 11 triples, 60 RBIs and was second in the NWL in stolen bases with 51. Although Dollander and Sullivan made just 14 starts apiece in High-A before their midseason promotions to Double-A Hartford, the pair made an impact for the Indians. They finished fifth and eighth, respectively, in the league in strikeouts despite making 10 to 12 starts fewer than the other league leaders. Sullivan went 7-2 with a 2.16 ERA and 101 strikeouts over 83⅓ innings. Dollander, the Colorado Rockies’ top pitching prospect and first-round pick in 2023, went 4-1 with a 2.82 ERA and 111 strikeouts over 70 innings with Spokane. Agnos and Skipper finished third and fourth in the league in saves, with 10 and nine, respectively, despite their midseason promotions. Agnos went 4-1 with a 0.73 ERA over 21 games, while Skipper went 7-1 with a 1.40 ERA over 34 games. The Indians, who won both halves of the NWL and finished 10½ games ahead of second-place Vancouver in the overall season standings, beat the Canadians 3-1 in the championship series last week.

author: @elsoldepuebla1
title: Andrés Villegas adelanta que Morena impugnará fallo que devolvió triunfo a ediles de Chignahuapan y V. Carranza
text:
“Quieren celebrar cuando van en segundo tiempo y vamos ganando 10-1”, lanzó el diputado local Andrés Villegas en contra de los partidos PAN y PRI , y reiteró que Morena impugnará la sentencia del Tribunal Electoral del Poder Judicial de la Federación (TEPJF) en la que devolvió el triunfo a Juan Lira y Marco Valencia como alcaldes de Chignahuapan y Venustiano Carranza.
En entrevista, el también presidente del Consejo Estatal de Morena suscribió lo anunciado por la dirigente estatal del partido, Olga Lucía Romero, e insistió en que seguirán agotando todos los mecanismos jurídicos para anular el triunfo de ambos candidatos y se convoque a elecciones extraordinarias en dichos municipios.
➡️ Únete al canal de El Sol de Puebla en WhatsApp para no perderte la información más importante
“Vamos a ir hasta las últimas instancias, los habitantes nos los piden, son los que están en esa incertidumbre, nos llegan llamadas y llamadas de muchos por la incertidumbre de que pueda quedar alguien que ganó a la mala o que se robó esta elección”, dijo.
En tanto, dijo no estar conforme con la sentencia emitida ayer por el TEPJF, pues el partido presentó pruebas contundentes de que las elecciones no fueron ‘limpias’.
“Yo creo que aventar porras y decir ‘ganamos’ o ‘les corregimos la plana’ son patadas nada más, porque no podemos perder el ojo de lo importante que es la gobernabilidad y la seguridad de los habitantes de Chignahuapan y Venustiano Carranza, eso es lo que está en juego”, insistió.
PRI defiende triunfo en Venustiano Carranza
Por su parte, la diputada priista Delfina Pozos dijo que la sentencia del TEPJF fue muestra de que el oficialismo (Morena) no puede abusar del poder ni pasar por encima de las instancias federales.
“Lo que estaban haciendo era ilegal, s noto que el tribunal local estaba complaciente hacia Morena y qué bueno que hoy la Sala Regional ratifica el triunfo, eso devuelve la confianza en las instituciones”, sostuvo.
➡️ Suscríbete a nuestro Newsletter y recibe las notas más relevantes en tu correo
Hizo un llamado a Morena para que cumpla su propio dicho y respete que ‘el pueblo manda’, pues el triunfo de Valencia fue legítimo.

author: Jesupemi Are
title: NPHCDA unveils new funding model to revatilise PHCs | TheCable
text: The National Primary Health Care Development Agency (NPHCDA) says it has introduced a new comprehensive funding model to revitalise primary healthcare centres (PHCs) across Nigeria. Muyi Aina, NPHCDA executive director, spoke in Abuja on Thursday during the inauguration of the basic health care provision fund (BHCPF 2.0). Aina said the move aims to evaluate progress across the health sector, focusing primarily on the effectiveness of the sector-wide approach (SWAP). He said BHCPF reforms would address long-standing issues of inadequate funding, mismanagement, and inefficiency in Nigeria’s PHC system. Advertisement “This new funding model will ensure that resources are allocated directly to the PHCs based on performance, patient outcomes, and facility requirements,” NAN quoted Aina to have said. “For the first time, local governments will have a significant role in the allocation and monitoring of these funds, which will make sure that the resources are spent where they are most needed.” The NPHCDA boss said the new reforms focus on improving access to healthcare services, ensuring the effective use of resources, and increasing accountability at the local government level. Advertisement The executive director said the new model also focuses on the integration of digital technologies for monitoring health services and strengthening data collection, reporting, and transparency. “A key aspect of the reforms is the establishment of an independent oversight committee that will monitor the proper utilisation of the funds at the grassroots level,” he said. “This will ensure that financial and operational accountability is upheld and that the PHCs meet the standards required to deliver quality healthcare. “The unveiling of the BHCPF 2.0 reforms is part of the ongoing efforts by the Nigerian government to boost the effectiveness of its healthcare system and improve the lives of millions of Nigerians in underserved communities. Advertisement “The initiative will also enable greater public and private sector collaboration in improving healthcare infrastructure and services.” Add a comment

organizations.name: National Primary Health Care Development Agency

author: @infobae
title: Temas del día de EFE Economía del viernes 1 de noviembre de 2024 (19:00 horas) - Infobae
text:
TEMPORAL INUNDACIONES
Madrid - Unas 140.000 personas que permanecían sin electricidad en la zona más dañada por la dana en la provincia de Valencia han recuperado en las últimas horas el suministro eléctrico, con lo que éste ha quedado ya restablecido para más del 90 % de los afectados inicialmente, han indicado a EFE fuentes de Iberdrola.
(Texto enviado a las 18:51, 14:41, 11:42 y 11:11 y 11:03 h.)
- El ministro Óscar Puente asegura que la Alta Velocidad entre Madrid y Valencia estará operativa "como mucho" en 15 días, ya que uno de los dos túneles afectados sólo está inundado y no dañado. (Texto enviado a las 11:01 h.)
.
JEREMY RIFKIN (Entrevista)
Madrid - El economista Jeremy Rifkin advierte en una entrevista de que el impacto del calentamiento global está alcanzado niveles "críticos y catastróficos" en sitios como España, "el país que más peligro corre dentro del continente en mayor riesgo del planeta" a causa del cambio climático y la alteración de los ciclos del agua.
(Texto enviado a las 8:04 h.)
.
ENERGÉTICAS RESULTADOS
Madrid - Las grandes energéticas han registrado un beneficio neto conjunto de unos 10.250 millones de euros hasta septiembre, impulsadas por Iberdrola y las plusvalías de su venta de activos en México, a la espera de que se concrete si el gravamen a estas compañías decae para el próximo ejercicio.
(Texto enviado a las 9:05 h.)(Texto)
- La vicepresidenta segunda y ministra de Trabajo, Yolanda Díaz, insiste a través de las redes sociales en su postura de que los gravámenes extraordinarios a bancos y energéticas deben mantenerse, ya que los impuestos sirven para mejorar derechos y servicios públicos. (Texto enviado a las 13:55 h.)
.
BANCO MEDIOLANUM
Milán (Italia) - El consejero delegado del Banco Mediolanum, la filial española del Grupo italiano Mediolanum, Luca Bosisio, prevé aprovechar la opa del BBVA sobre el Banco Sabadell para captar clientes, pero está convencido de que no les hace falta para seguir creciendo a toda velocidad en España, como han hecho este año.
(Texto enviado a las 9:11 h.)
.
EEUU DESEMPLEO
Washington - La creación de empleo en Estados Unidos se desplomó en octubre hasta los 12.000 puestos de trabajo netos creados, 211.000 menos que el mes pasado, mientras que la tasa de desempleo se mantuvo en el 4,1 %, informó este viernes la Oficina de Estadísticas Laborales (BLS, en inglés).
(Texto enviado a las 15:46, 14:03 h.)
.
EEUU PETROLERAS
Nueva York - Los resultados económicos publicados este viernes de las petroleras estadounidenses Chevron y Exxon Mobil superaron las expectativas de los analistas, razón por las que las compañías vieron subir sus acciones casi un 5 % y un 0,78 %, respectivamente, pese a registraron ganancias más bajas.
(Texto enviado a las 15:51 h.)
- Exxon Mobil, la mayor petrolera estadounidense, ganó 26.070 millones de dólares en los nueve primeros meses del año, lo que supone un 8,13 % menos que en el mismo periodo de 2023. (Texto enviado a las 14:09 h.)
- La petrolera estadounidense Chevron ganó 14.422 millones de dólares en los nueve primeros meses del año, un 24,53 % menos que el mismo periodo del año anterior. (Texto enviado a las 13:51 h.GMT)
.
MERCADOS COYUNTURA
Madrid - Los mercados bursátiles cierran una semana de tono negativo marcada por los resultados empresariales, en especial de las grandes compañías tecnológicas, y la cercanía de las elecciones presidenciales en Estados Unidos.
(Texto) (Foto) (Vídeo)
.
EEUU ELECCIONES (Análisis)
Pekín - China observa impasible las elecciones presidenciales estadounidenses que se celebran el martes, ya que gane Donald Trump o Kamala Harris el gigante asiático cree que Washington mantendrá una política de "contención" hacia Pekín con nuevas restricciones en el plano tecnológico y el comercial. Por Jesús Centeno
(Texto enviado a las 10:03 horas) (Recursos de archivo en www.lafototeca.com Cód: 9806123, 9806121)
Nueva York - Los candidatos a la Casa Blanca, Kamala Harris y Donald Trump, traen agendas muy diferentes en sus políticas económicas sobre fiscalidad y aranceles, aunque ambos coinciden en su interés por reducir la inflación y evitan formular propuestas concretas para rebajar la abultada deuda nacional. (Claves) (Texto enviado a las 14:03 h.)
EFECOM
